body:
Hello, Avicus. 
16 months ago I stumbled across a server with the IP: skywars.co, Avicus. I let it stay in my server list for awhile until in June when I went on and played my first match of nebula on the map Senex II. I dedicated 18 days of my life to this server, made a map, and got to 4th prestige (;( that doesn't exist anymore). I've strengthened friendships and made new ones. As of march 8th, I discovered CS:GO, which has now taken over my life. I don't feel like I will be consistently playing on Avicus anymore, but I will be playing CS:GO. Avicus has brought me some of the best moments of my gaming experience. Defiantly job done damn well. But all good things come to an end, so I will be retiring from Avicus. I may visit sometimes. If you wanna play CS:GO with me just add me as a friend on steam, (my name is source_route).
PEACE

If you wanna play CS:GO with me just add me as a friend on steam, (my name is source_route).
PEACE
title: Retirement

replies.body: It was good playing with you, source_route
replies.body_tagged: It was good playing with you, source_route

replies.body:
:c

You will come crawling back. CS:GO will get boring and we'll still be here.

Until then, farewell.
replies.body_tagged:
:c

You will come crawling back. CS:GO will get boring and we'll still be here.

Until then, farewell.

replies.body:
Are people using "retirement" now to get attention to their leaving thread? 
Sorry you have to leave but...
Is this not allowed?
"I don't feel like I will be consistently playing on Avicus anymore"
Does that mean you will be playing avicus... Just not consistently?
"I may visit sometimes"
Yep...  If you're gonna make a leave post at least have these two key elements.
1. Title doesn't say "retirement". You may be leaving after avicus a while but it's not a retirement, it's leaving. Retiring is for the mods who decided to give they jobs up :P 
2. Don't indicate that you may come back xd As that is not leaving but taking a break which doesn't really need a post :P
But either way... Have fun playing CS:GO... Got bored of it after a bit, not fun playing alone.

replies.body_tagged:

replies.body:
Counter- Kitchen Table
Strike- 10 pins in bowling
Global- World
Offensive- Rude

As we can see here, this is the true meaning of the game. He likes to be rude while bowling on kitchen tables in the world tournament.

But wait! 5 underlined words, yet 4 words that make up CS:GO. How is this possible? 
4 in 5? 5-4=1 and there are 2 numbers in the equation. 1+2=3. 3? And yet there were 6 numbers used in the equation 5-4=1 and 1+2=3. So we are left with 3 and 6. 3 6's?
3 sides in a triangle=Illuminati Confirmed. But wait! Three 6's is the mighty one and we all know what that means. He is the mighty one. But wait! In the equations 5-4=1 and 1+2=3, there are 5 different numbers. That leaves us back to the 5 underlined words. This is truly a mystery, we now have 3,5, and 6. Now 3x5 is 15 and 15+6=21. We just traveled through time. From the days of the illuminati, the devil, and 21. Quite shocking that this is what this game has become.
